Z

zombie - Variable in class test.ZombieTest
The Zombie Object that is analysed
Zombie - Class in model
The Zombie class provides the PlantsVSZombie game with a single Piece type that once called can create a Zombie Piece in of itself.
Zombie() - Constructor for class model.Zombie
Creates a Zombie with 5 health, 2 attack damage and 0 cost value.
Zombie(String, char, int, int, int) - Constructor for class model.Zombie
 
zombieCount - Variable in class model.XMLParser
 
zombieKilled() - Method in class model.GameLevels
The Method is used to subtract the current number of zombies when a zombie is killed
zombieLimit - Variable in class model.GameLevels
The Maximum numbers of the zombies for a given level
zombieLimit - Variable in class model.XMLParser
 
zombieRemaining - Variable in class model.XMLParser
 
zombies - Variable in class controller.Controller
To Track the Number of Zombies currently on the board
zombiesSpawned - Variable in class model.GameLevels
The is used to keep track of the zombies that had been spawned prior to save command (For Load/Save Functionality)
ZombieTest - Class in test
The Test Class for ZOMBIE (Piece SubClass)
ZombieTest() - Constructor for class test.ZombieTest
